author: wtopstaff
title: Canadiens-Senators Sums
text:
1 1—5 
First Period_1, Ottawa, Neil 1 (Turris, Michalek), 4:43. 2, Montreal, Weise 3, 9:17 (pp). 3, Ottawa, Hoffman 3 (Stone, Turris), 9:36. 4, Ottawa, C.Wideman 1 (Stone, Turris), 17:04. Penalties_Fraser, Ott (cross-checking), 2:03; Smith, Ott (roughing), 7:20; Fleischmann, Mon (hooking), 14:06. 
Second Period_5, Montreal, Galchenyuk 2 (Beaulieu, Petry), 7:18 (pp). 6, Montreal, Gallagher 1 (Beaulieu, Gilbert), 11:02. 7, Ottawa, Stone 3 (Karlsson), 16:53 (pp). Penalties_Gilbert, Mon (holding), 4:21; Neil, Ott (holding), 7:07; Weise, Mon (tripping), 15:55. 
Third Period_8, Ottawa, Ceci 2 (Hoffman, Turris), 12:59. 9, Montreal, Pacioretty 1 (Smith-Pelly, Beaulieu), 19:20. Penalties_Smith, Ott (hooking), 9:29. 
Shots on Goal_Montreal 19-11-7_37. Ottawa 8-5-2_15. 
Power-play opportunities_Montreal 2 of 4; Ottawa 1 of 3. 
Goalies_Montreal, Tokarski 0-1-0 (15 shots-10 saves). Ottawa, O’Connor 2-0-1 (37-33). 
A_17,912 (19,153). T_2:22. 
Referees_Marc Joannette, Justin St. Pierre. Linesmen_Steve Barton, Mark Wheler. Topics:
